descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...different colors
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...add the different colors from top to bottom

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... a large grid with different colors placed over a black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is much smaller and is similar to the size of the area outside the blue block on the input grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...move all of the colors inside the output with the gray block in the above right and low left corner, green is placed starting from the right corner. red is in up left, blue under red, red is middle, blue under red

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...the different colors of image
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is  on the colored image rather than black
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...visualize the table and fill out the colors which on the picture

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...change size
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...change size and color
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...change size

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... colors that are randomly across the grid
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...Will be large enough to contain the number of all the colored squares
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...Follow the input grid colored squares from left to right.  The left most color will be in the top left.  The next colored square will to to the right.  Each colored square will get its own square in the output.  Continue this until you reach the top right corner of the output grid size.  Then the next colored square will go under the top right and then they will fill in output grid to the left until it reaches the left edge.  Then the it will go below that and continue to the right again.  Do this until all of the colored squares from the input grid are used. The remaining squares in the output grid will be black.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a different color block in six of the vertical row.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...use the first three colors starting from the left to form the top row, put them from left to right. The second row is the three colors from the right placed from left to right as well. The bottom row is all black.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... single colored squares randomly across the grid.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... changes to 3x3
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... add the colored in order from left to right, leave any remaining spots blank at the end
